Yvonne Mokgoro (amụrụ na 19 Ọktoba, na afọ 1950) bụ onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Iwu nke South Africa na nwunye Job Mokgoro.
Nelson Mandela họpụtara Mokgoro ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche n'afọ 1994
Mokgoro bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke Centre for Human Rights na Mahadum Pretoria ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke South African Law Reform Commission ugbu a.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum North-West ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere B.luris na afọ 1982, nzere LLB afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, na LLM na 1987
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pennsylvania Law School na US, ebe e nyere ya nzere LLM ọzọ.

N'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2021, ndị United Nations Human Rights Council họpụtara Mokgoro dị ka onye isi oche nke Racial Justice Body, usoro ọhụrụ iji nyochaa ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na iji ike eme ihe megide ndị Afrịka na ndị si n'Afrịka site na mmanye iwu n'ụwa niile. Ọ ga-abụ otu n'ime ndị otu atọ tinyere Juan E
Méndez nke Argentina na Tracie L

N'etiti ọtụtụ onyinye e nyere ya bụ Human Rights Award site na Black Lawyers Association, (1995) Oude Molen Reserve Order of Merit (1995/1996), Legal Profession's Woman Achiever Award site na Centre for Human Rights, Mahadum Pretoria (2001), Mahadum nke North School of Law Excellence Award (2003), Kate Stoneman Democracy Award (2003), Tshwane Outstanding Service Award (TOSA) na 2006 na James Wilson Award site na Mahadum Pennsylvania Law School (2008).
